thread.section_title: CarRental8 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarRental8 | carrental8.com
thread.title: JUAN LUIS

author: JUAN LUIS
title: JUAN LUIS
text: I have using CR8 for all my rentals during the most recent years, leveraged by very competitive rental tariffs. However, the process at front desk when receiving the unit is always confusing, as there are always "an additional required insurance or toll or 3rd party something", which ends adding increasing unexpected costs to the rental. Your service should provide a mora complete all-included tariff guaranteeing that the customer gets what need and there are no "other mandatory costs".
